text: Before undertaking any control measures, a wildlife control services provider shall provide to the client, in writing, the following:
historical:
Legislative History of Laws

For history of Law 18-289, see notes under § 8-2201.

Editor's Notes

Former § 8-2203 has been recodified as § 8-2033.

DC CODE § 8-2203

Current through December 11, 2012

sections.text: An assessment of the problem, including identification of possible causes of the problem;
The methods and practices that may be used to resolve the problem, clearly specifying possible lethal and nonlethal means;
An estimate of the fee to be charged; and
Where applicable, the methods and practices which the client may employ in the future to limit recurrence of the problem.
